solution_line_template: Per day, the amount of milk produced is {milk_per_cow_per_day}*{num_cows} = <<{milk_per_cow_per_day}*{num_cows}={milk_per_day}>>{milk_per_day} oz.
Per week, the amount of milk produced is {milk_per_day}*{days_per_week} = <<{milk_per_day}*{days_per_week}={milk_per_week}>>{milk_per_week} oz.
